articles.author: PerthNow
articles.title: Good Morning America star T.J. Holmes files for divorce after affair with co-anchor Amy Robach made public - PerthNow
articles.description: Good Morning America star T.J. Holmes has filed for divorce just four weeks after he was caught in a shock cheating scandal with his co-anchor Amy Robach.
articles.content:
Good Morning America star T.J. Holmes has filed for divorce just four weeks after he was caught in a shock cheating scandal with his co-anchor Amy Robach.
The host has been married to his wife Maril… [+1932 chars]
